name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks: Your Meeting Teleprompter for Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your productivity and stay organized during meetings with Blocks, the innovative teleprompter extension designed specifically for Google Meet! 🎤💻

Blocks lets you add notes as easy-to-read blocks of text and seamlessly integrate them into your Google Meet sessions—so you can focus on what matters most.

🔑 Key Features

• 📜 Integrated Teleprompter: Effortlessly add and view segmented blocks of text, allowing you to zero in on key points without distractions.
• 📋 Sidebar Display: Access your pre-saved notes directly in the native Google Meet sidebar—no more switching between apps!
• ⚡ Easy Access: Just open your Google Meet link and instantly see all the blocks you’ve prepared for smooth, efficient communication.
•  📈 Productivity Boost: Perfect for tech pros and anyone in frequent virtual meetings, Blocks helps you collect your thoughts and present them with clarity.

💡 Who Should Use Blocks?

Blocks is perfect for:

• 👨‍💻👩‍💻 Tech professionals who need to stay organized and articulate during meetings.
• 💬 Virtual meeting regulars  looking for a reliable way to reference their notes on the go.
• 🤝 Teams seeking to improve meeting productivity and communication efficiency.

🚀 Get Started

Install Blocks from the Chrome Web Store and revolutionize the way you manage meetings. Stay focused, stay organized, and make every meeting count with Blocks! ✅
